configurations.name: community
configurations.description: Target community for establishing snmp communication

configurations.name: snmp_version
configurations.description: snmp version being used. net-snmp version definition: SNMP_VERSION_1:0 SNMP_VERSION_2c:1 SNMP_VERSION_2u:2 SNMP_VERSION_3:3

configurations.name: timeout
configurations.description: Time in millisecond after which the the snmp request times out

configurations.name: udp_socket_ip
configurations.description: IP for UDP socket listener to listen on. Should be localhost IP of container or VM running TSC Service.

configurations.name: udp_socket_port
configurations.description: Port for UDP Socket Listener to list on. TSC configuration sets which port/host NTCIP SPaT data will be broadcast to.

configurations.name: socket_timeout
configurations.description: Timeout in seconds for UDP Socket Listener. If UDP Socket Listener does not receive messages for this amount of time it will shutdown and thrown an exception.

configurations.name: spat_producer_topic
configurations.description: Kafka topic for streets internal SPAT messages

configurations.name: use_tsc_timestamp
configurations.description: If false will use host machine unix time for SPaT timestamp, If true will use ntcip message provided timestamp for SPaT timestamp.

configurations.name: use_tsc_state_spat_update
configurations.description: If true will enable tsc_state to update incoming spat with calculated future movement events, using traffic signal controller configuration information
